tasks.gen-cov: rm -rf .cov_profile && deno test --coverage=.cov_profile -A && deno coverage .cov_profile --lcov --exclude=vendor > .cov_profile/cov_profile.lcov && genhtml -o .cov_profile/html .cov_profile/cov_profile.lcov
tasks.pre-commit: deno task fmt --check && deno task lint && deno task test
tasks.vendor:
rm -rf vendor/; deno vendor --config .empty-config.json --force studio_pack_generator.ts deps.ts test_deps.ts pre-commit-fast.ts; echo '{
}' > .empty-config.json
